Class SinglePaginationTableScreen<T>

java.lang.Object
com.group6.hms.framework.screens.Screen
com.group6.hms.framework.screens.option.OptionScreen
com.group6.hms.framework.screens.pagination.PaginationTableScreen<T>
com.group6.hms.framework.screens.pagination.SinglePaginationTableScreen<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the items to be displayed in the table.
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScreenLifeCycle
Direct Known Subclasses:
MedicalRecordScreen, NotificationScreen, PastOutcomeRecordsScreen, PatientMedicalRecordsScreen, PharmacistViewAndManageAppointmentOutcomeRecordScreen, ReplenishmentRequestScreen, UpdateConsultationNotesScreen, ViewMoreDetailsAppointmentScreen
public abstract class SinglePaginationTableScreen<T> extends PaginationTableScreen<T>
SinglePaginationTableScreen is an abstract class that extends PaginationTableScreen to provide the functionality for displaying items in a single vertical paginated table, where each item is displayed individually.

      header - the title or header of the screen.
      items - the list of items to be displayed.

    • printTable

      protected void printTable(List<T> sublist)
      Prints a given sublist of items by individually displaying each item.
      Overrides:
      printTable in class PaginationTableScreen<T>
      Parameters:
      sublist - the sublist of items to be printed. Each item in the sublist will be displayed individually.
